column4: hiii..  i have downloaded a racing game for linux called    racer .... tha file was  in    .run format and i installed it .... now how can i uninstall the game ????
you need to figure where it was installed, how are you starting the game ?
usually it does not.. at least.. for games
a .run file is just a script. it could have installed files anywhere, but usually game packages are self contained into a single dir
